scene.name: intro
scene.line: I guess they must have gone through some papers here. It was in some disarray and a few folders were pulled out and left on the table. I mean it wasn't `too` bad; I only notice cause Diane is such a stickler. She's real organized, I mean.
scene.option: What folders were they looking at?

scene.name: folders
scene.line: Yeah, uh ... mostly stuff about the building site, I guess. They had a list of all the homes we relocated here. A list of original residences before we leveled the neighborhood. I'd guess they were looking for one of the old residents.

scene.name: non-resident-folder
scene.line: They pulled out a list of the folks who didn't take the offer, folks who moved elsewhere, but they filed that back — out of order — so I guess they didn't find what they were looking for there.

scene.name: complaint
scene.line: Hey, uh, while I have you here ... work's kind of slowed down, and it seems like — I know you folks know what you're doing, but it seems like the residents are just kind of ... settling in?
scene.option: We'll get your boys back to work soon.

scene.name: the-idea
scene.line: Yeah, I get that. Just — how about that roof, huh? You just write us a check and we'll finish it right up! I know you've got this museum thing going on, but you don't want to be slumlords, now ...

scene.name: back-to-work
scene.line: Yeah, sure, I get you ... ha ha.
You happen get that last invoice ... ?
